mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ASS_TRAN_STORE_General (
group_id ,
hos_id ,
copy_code ,
tran_no ,
out_store_id ,
out_store_no ,
in_store_id ,
in_store_no ,
create_emp ,
create_date ,
state ,
note ,
) VALUES (
#{group_id} ,
#{hos_id} ,
#{copy_code} ,
#{tran_no} ,
#{out_store_id} ,
#{out_store_no} ,
#{in_store_id} ,
#{in_store_no} ,
#{create_emp} ,
to_date(#{create_date},'YYYY-MM-DD') ,
#{state} ,
#{note}
)
mapper.select:
SELECT a.group_id, a.hos_id, a.copy_code, a.tran_no, a.out_store_id, a.out_store_no, d1.store_code out_store_code, d1.store_name out_store_name, a.in_store_id, a.in_store_no, d2.store_code in_store_code, d2.store_name in_store_name, a.create_emp, su1.user_name create_emp_name, a.create_date, a.audit_emp, su2.user_name audit_emp_name, a.audit_date, a.state, case when a.state = 0 then '新建' when a.state = 1 then '审核' when a.state = 2 then '移库确认' else '' end state_name, a.note FROM ASS_TRAN_STORE_General a left join hos_store_dict d1 on a.group_id = d1.group_id and a.hos_id = d1.hos_id and a.out_store_id = d1.store_id and d1.is_stop = 0
left join hos_store_dict d2 on a.group_id = d2.group_id and a.hos_id = d2.hos_id and a.in_store_id = d2.store_id and d2.is_stop = 0
left join sys_user su1 on a.group_id = su1.group_id and a.hos_id = su1.hos_id and a.create_emp = su1.user_id
left join sys_user su2 on a.group_id = su2.group_id and a.hos_id = su2.hos_id and a.audit_emp = su2.user_id WHERE a.group_id = #{group_id} and a.hos_id = #{hos_id} and a.copy_code = #{copy_code} and a.tran_no = #{tran_no}

SELECT a.tran_no ID, a.tran_no, a.out_store_id, a.out_store_no, d1.store_code out_store_code, d1.store_name out_store_name, a.in_store_id, a.in_store_no, d2.store_code in_store_code, d2.store_name in_store_name, su1.user_name create_emp, to_char(a.create_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as create_date, su2.user_name audit_emp, to_char(a.audit_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as audit_date, case when a.state = 0 then '新建' when a.state = 1 then '审核' when a.state = 2 then '移库确认' else '' end state, a.note FROM ASS_TRAN_STORE_General a left join hos_store_dict d1 on a.group_id = d1.group_id and a.hos_id = d1.hos_id and a.out_store_id = d1.store_id and d1.is_stop = 0
left join hos_store_dict d2 on a.group_id = d2.group_id and a.hos_id = d2.hos_id and a.in_store_id = d2.store_id and d2.is_stop = 0
left join sys_user su1 on a.group_id = su1.group_id and a.hos_id = su1.hos_id and a.create_emp = su1.user_id
left join sys_user su2 on a.group_id = su2.group_id and a.hos_id = su2.hos_id and a.audit_emp = su2.user_id WHERE a.group_id = #{group_id} AND a.hos_id = #{hos_id} AND a.copy_code = #{copy_code} AND a.tran_no in (${paraId})
order by a.create_date desc

SELECT a.tran_no, a.out_store_id, a.out_store_no, d1.store_code out_store_code, d1.store_name out_store_name, a.in_store_id, a.in_store_no, d2.store_code in_store_code, d2.store_name in_store_name, su1.user_name create_emp, to_char(a.create_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as create_date, su2.user_name audit_emp, to_char(a.audit_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as audit_date, case when a.state = 0 then '新建' when a.state = 1 then '审核' when a.state = 2 then '移库确认' else '' end state, a.note FROM ASS_TRAN_STORE_General a left join hos_store_dict d1 on a.group_id = d1.group_id and a.hos_id = d1.hos_id and a.out_store_id = d1.store_id and d1.is_stop = 0
left join hos_store_dict d2 on a.group_id = d2.group_id and a.hos_id = d2.hos_id and a.in_store_id = d2.store_id and d2.is_stop = 0
left join sys_user su1 on a.group_id = su1.group_id and a.hos_id = su1.hos_id and a.create_emp = su1.user_id
left join sys_user su2 on a.group_id = su2.group_id and a.hos_id = su2.hos_id and a.audit_emp = su2.user_id WHERE a.group_id = #{group_id} AND a.hos_id = #{hos_id} AND a.copy_code = #{copy_code} AND a.tran_no = #{tran_no}
order by a.create_date desc
